body_html: Quick update. I discovered that using map_fn and setting parallel_iterations to a small number addresses my current needs. Nonetheless, I think it would be very helpful if there was a general mechanism by which TF prevented (unnecessary) failures due to running out of memory.
body_text: Quick update. I discovered that using map_fn and setting parallel_iterations to a small number addresses my current needs. Nonetheless, I think it would be very helpful if there was a general mechanism by which TF prevented (unnecessary) failures due to running out of memory.
body: Quick update. I discovered that using `map_fn` and setting `parallel_iterations` to a small number addresses my current needs. Nonetheless, I think it would be very helpful if there was a general mechanism by which TF prevented (unnecessary) failures due to running out of memory.
